title: EcoTracker MERN App
description: A full-stack sustainability tracking application built with MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. Features user authentication, data visualization, and real-time updates.

title: MindfulMoments Mobile App
description: Cross-platform meditation and wellness app built with React Native. Includes guided meditations, progress tracking, and social features.

title: TaskFlow SPA
description: Modern single-page application for project management with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time collaboration, and intuitive design.

title: WeatherWise PWA
description: Progressive web app providing detailed weather forecasts with offline capabilities, location-based services, and beautiful animations.

title: CryptoPortfolio Tracker
description: Real-time cryptocurrency portfolio tracking application with advanced charts, alerts, and portfolio analytics.

title: FitnessPal Mobile
description: Comprehensive fitness tracking mobile application with workout plans, nutrition tracking, and social challenges.
